lines.text: Ninja? What the hell are ninja?
They're a secret Japanese society expert in the art of assassination.
Tell me, what would Japanese assassins be doing in this part of the world, taking a vacation?
This is really beginning to get on my tits!
I don't like that tiny maggot, I don't like him at all. I mean what is this? Ninjas? Drug pushers? My men being kidnapped and murdered? This is really beginning to get on my tits.
Well, gentlemen, I don't think the U.S. armed forces ever let a lady down yet.
Yes, sir, we should kick some ass.
What do we do now, Leo?

[as he runs away]
Kiss my ass.
I'll see if I can find Mr. Burke for you.

[referring to Sgt. Singh with a sneer]
Catch that little weasel!

[to a woman at the bar]
How about lunch?
[she smashes a bottle on his head]
...I guess this means lunch is out of the question.
